hello.intro:
The [Hampton Classic Horse Show](https://www.hamptonclassic.com/) runs August 23–30, 2026 at the [Hampton Classic Horse Show](https://www.hamptonclassic.com/) in Bridgehampton, NY. Expect FEI 5* and 2* show jumping with world‑class hunters, a polished showground feel, and a spectator‑friendly layout that keeps the grand‑prix focus clear. Warm‑up-ring flow rewards timing and course-walk prep for a smooth week.

Bridgehampton carries an easy coastal‑village vibe: mornings start crisp, afternoons soften with salt air, and evenings lean social along village streets. It’s late‑summer in the Hamptons, so plan resets between rides with a quick vendor-row stroll and jog-strip timing in mind—clean, rider‑first days built for a-circuit rhythm.
hello.outro: Keep the week simple and sport-forward. I can book lodging, map one barn dinner, and prep essentials so you walk into Hampton Classic Horse Show ready to ride, with confirmations organized and adjustments handled quickly.

stay.title: Where to Stay
stay.paragraph: Set close and quiet: [Topping Rose House](https://www.toppingrosehouse.com) for luxury near the rings, [Baron’s Cove](https://www.caperesorts.com/barons-cove) for harbor views in Sag Harbor, and [Southampton Inn](https://www.southamptoninn.com) for village convenience and easy parking.
stay.cta: Want it handled? I'll lock rooms and sync confirmations.

dine.title: Dine
dine.overview: Keep meals simple and close to the showgrounds: quick daytime bites, then seated dinners that work around orders-of-go.
dine.am: For breakfast, book a calm start at [Topping Rose House Restaurant](https://www.toppingrosehouse.com/dining).
dine.dinner: After rounds, Sag Harbor and Bridgehampton offer reliable sit‑downs: [Page at 63 Main](https://www.page63main.com) for farm‑to‑table plates and [Almond](https://www.almondrestaurant.com) for French‑American bistro classics.
dine.cta: I'll map a barn-friendly dinner loop with quick reservations.

items.name: World Pie
items.alt: Casual pizza and salads near venue

items.name: Estia's Little Kitchen
items.alt: Local favorite for brunch and lunch

locale.title: Locale - Off-Barn
locale.paragraph: Reset with short village walks, quick coffee runs, and harbor sunsets; save longer beach time for off days so the ring stays first.

essentials.title: Essentials
essentials.paragraph: Stock up at [King Kullen](https://www.kingkullen.com) and keep meds covered at [CVS Pharmacy](https://www.cvs.com). For barn needs, [Hampton Feed & Tack](https://hamptonfeedtack.com) has feed and bedding. Wheels are easy via [Enterprise](https://www.enterprise.com), and carts by [Dever, Inc.](https://www.deverinc.com).
essentials.cta: I'll pack a lean kit so nothing slows your rounds.

items.name: King Kullen Bridgehampton
items.alt: Closest full grocery to the showgrounds
